[gofumports] skip 'don''t add or remove imports'

gofumpt -w foo.go .
cmp foo.go foo.go.golden

-- foo.go --
package p

import (
	"io"

	_ "bufio" // for a side effect
)

import (
	"os"

	"foo.local/one"

	bytes_ "bytes"

	"io"
)

import (
	"foo.local/two"

	"fmt"
)
-- foo.go.golden --
package p

import (
	"io"

	_ "bufio" // for a side effect
)

import (
	bytes_ "bytes"
	"io"
	"os"

	"foo.local/one"
)

import (
	"fmt"

	"foo.local/two"
)
